backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a restaurant booking system with role-based access control; exposes submitBooking (users only), getAllBookings (admins only, sorted by date), and clearAllBookings (admins only).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the admin dashboard route was changed from '/admin' to '/pindpahadi-manage-2024' in App.tsx, with high confidence and linked to test REQ-18.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes using OKLCH color values, plus global border and background defaults.
frontend/index.html: SEO-optimized HTML entry point with full meta tags, Open Graph tags, and JSON-LD LocalBusiness/Restaurant schema markup for Pind Pahadi Restaurant Delhi.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router tree with a pathless siteLayoutRoute wrapping five public pages (Header/Footer/chrome) and a standalone '/pindpahadi-manage-2024' admin route without site chrome.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site-wide footer with brand info, quick navigation links, contact details (address, phone, hours, directions), dynamic copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with bilingual restaurant branding, desktop nav links with active-state highlighting, a clickable phone button, and a mobile hamburger drawer.
Fixed bottom bar visible only on mobile (lg:hidden) providing three quick-action buttons: Call, Directions (Google Maps), and Book Table.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: Renders a row of star icons based on a numeric rating, supporting configurable max stars and three size variants (sm, md, lg).
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Fixed floating WhatsApp button that opens a pre-filled WhatsApp chat link to the restaurant's number when clicked.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports useSubmitBooking (mutation) and useGetAllBookings (query) hooks that call the ICP backend actor for booking operations via React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Poppins and Noto Sans Devanagari fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines a Punjabi earthy CSS custom-property color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About Us page displaying the restaurant's origin story, core values, and team members with a decorative header and image section.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Multi-step admin dashboard with a password gate, Internet Identity login, and a table view of all bookings fetched from the ICP backend.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact and table-booking page with a validated reservation form that submits to the ICP backend, plus contact info and an embedded Google Maps iframe.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page for Pind Pahadi restaurant featuring a hero section, featured dishes, why-choose-us highlights, testimonials, and a Google Maps embed with contact/navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/Menu.tsx: Menu page displaying categorized food items (Starters, Main Course, Beverages, Combos) with tab-based filtering, item details, and a call-to-order button.
frontend/src/pages/Reviews.tsx: Reviews page showing a 4.8-star rating summary with a star distribution breakdown and detailed customer testimonial cards.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom brand colors, fonts (Poppins, Noto Sans Devanagari), shadows, border radii, animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the full project state (version 7) for the Pind Pahadi Restaurant Delhi multi-page website, including architectural notes, existing features with IDs/versions, and known issues. Serves as the source of truth for all implemented and planned features across Home, Menu, About Us, Reviews, and Contact/Book Table pages.
